title: How to Draw Courage the Cowardly Dog

steps.headline: Sketch Courage's body.
steps.description: Courage has an egg shaped body, so begin by drawing and egg in the middle of your paper.

steps.headline: Add his head.
steps.description: Once you have the egg sketched, on top of the egg (this will cover some of the eggs head), you will sketch a hat with a flat end. Once the hat is drawn erase the egg lines that are inside of the egg.

steps.headline: Adjust the body and head shape.
steps.description: Draw the nose in a triangular shape.

steps.headline: Add the body and head details, including the mouth, limbs, and tail.
steps.description: When drawing paws think of them as a three leaf clover.

steps.headline: Add the eyes and ears.
steps.description: When drawing the eyes, think of them as ovals. The ears almost resemble hot dogs on a stick, just bent.

steps.headline: Sketch in the smaller details and finish up.
steps.description: Add any final details around Courage's neck and snout. When details are done, erase any extra pencil lines.

text: Sketch Courage's body. Courage has an egg shaped body, so begin by drawing and egg in the middle of your paper. Add his head. Once you have the egg sketched, on top of the egg (this will cover some of the eggs head), you will sketch a hat with a flat end. Once the hat is drawn erase the egg lines that are inside of the egg. Adjust the body and head shape. Draw the nose in a triangular shape. Add the body and head details, including the mouth, limbs, and tail. When drawing paws think of them as a three leaf clover. Add the eyes and ears. When drawing the eyes, think of them as ovals. The ears almost resemble hot dogs on a stick, just bent. Sketch in the smaller details and finish up. Add any final details around Courage's neck and snout. When details are done, erase any extra pencil lines.
